name: Shoals Technologies Group, Inc.
description: Shoals Technologies Group, Inc. is a leading provider of electrical balance of system (EBOS) solutions for solar energy projects. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Portland, Tennessee, the company specializes in innovative products that enhance the efficiency and performance of solar energy systems. Shoals develops a wide range of solutions including wire management, electrical components, and other systems that facilitate the installation and operation of solar power facilities. The company has established itself as a critical player in the renewable energy space, supporting the rapid adoption of solar energy across the United States and internationally. Shoals' commitment to innovation is evident in their focus on developing advanced technologies that streamline the installation process and improve the overall reliability of solar energy systems. With a mission to enable the solar industry to scale effectively, Shoals is dedicated to delivering high-quality, cost-effective solutions that drive the transition to clean energy. As the demand for renewable energy sources continues to grow, Shoals is well-positioned to capitalize on the expanding market for solar energy solutions.
